Criteria: Company does not have HQ in China, Iran, Russia
Signals: Country mentions: "China", "Russia", "Iran", Office addresses, "Mainland China users", localized versions for these regions

Criteria: Self-described ‘software company’
Public site exposes “/api”, “/docs”, or “/developer”.
Signals: \bAPI\b, API documentation, Developer API, Integration, RESTful API, GraphQL, Webhooks

Criteria: Public status page link.
Claims 99.9 % (or higher) uptime SLA.
Search Query: site:{website} ("99.9" OR "99.99" OR "99.95" OR "99.999") (uptime OR SLA OR availability)

Criteria: Site or docs mention more than one country
Search Query: site:{website} ("data" OR "location" OR "available" OR "presence") (countries OR regions OR worldwide OR global)
Signals: “East Asia and the Pacific”, “EAP”, “Europe and Central Asia”, “ECA”, “Latin America and the Caribbean”, “LAC”, “Middle East and North Africa”, “MENA”, “North America”, “NA”, “South Asia”, “SA”, “Sub-Saharan Africa”, “SSA”, “Eastern”, “Middle East”, “Europe”, “Asia”, “America”, “Oceania”, "EMEA"...

Criteria: Provides video streaming, video content, OTT, or broadcasting services.
Signals: streaming, video on demand (VOD), live stream, watch now, HD video, 4K streaming, OTT platform, broadcast

Criteria: Company offers video content
Real-time coverage
Global audience reach
Signals: “East Asia and the Pacific”, “EAP”, “Europe and Central Asia”, “ECA”, “Latin America and the Caribbean”, “LAC”, “Middle East and North Africa”, “MENA”, “North America”, “NA”, “South Asia”, “SA”, “Sub-Saharan Africa”, “SSA”, “Eastern”, “Middle East”, “Europe”, “Asia”, “America”, “Oceania”, "EMEA", "APAC", "DACH", "worldwide", "globally"

Criteria: Hosts large-scale live events or broadcasts
Signals: “Live event with X million viewers”, “sports broadcast”, “streamed to millions of viewers” , “world championship broadcast”

Criteria: Offers 4 K, HDR, or 8 K video quality.
Press releases or blogs covering streaming performance improvements
Signals: Post title with “buffering”, “startup delay”, “latency”, “Reduced buffering” , “cut startup delay” , “latency improvements”

Criteria: Case studies mentioning traffic surges during live events
Signals: “Handled X× traffic during live match” etc.

Criteria: The company develops, publishes, or operates online games
Mentions multiplayer, online servers, or live-service model.
Publisher has more than 100 employees
Publishes updates
Operates a dedicated game launcher/platform
Mentions DDoS protection or past attacks mitigation
The company operates an online financial platform (banking, trading, payments, fintech)
Website presence of a user-facing portal, app login, or transactional interface
Mentions secure transactions or compliance (PCI DSS, ISO 27001, GDPR, KYC, etc.).
Search Query: site:{website} ("PCI" OR "ISO" OR "GDPR" OR "KYC" OR "secure" OR "data")

Criteria: Mentions of more than 1 country service coverage
Search Query: site:{website} ("available" OR "presence" OR "coverage" OR "data") (USA OR Germany OR Singapore OR France OR Brazil OR India)
Signals: “East Asia and the Pacific”, “EAP”, “Europe and Central Asia”, “ECA”, “Latin America and the Caribbean”, “LAC”, “Middle East and North Africa”, “MENA”, “North America”, “NA”, “South Asia”, “SA”, “Sub-Saharan Africa”, “SSA”, “Eastern”, “Middle East”, “Europe”, “Asia”, “America”, ...

Criteria: Blog discussing latency, uptime, scaling
Search Query: site:{website} ("latency" OR "uptime" OR "scaling") (blog OR engineering OR "tech")

Criteria: Published news about DDoS incidents or security events
Signals: Press release containing “DDoS attack” or “breach”, “Mitigated DDoS attack” , “security incident”
